ruleset.name: Apex Documentation Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex documentation standards

rule.name: SingleLineDocumentationFormat
rule.message: ApexDoc comments must be properly formatted: single-line comments need spaces after /** and before */, multi-line comments should be used only when necessary
rule.description: Single-line ApexDoc comments must be formatted with spaces: /** comment */ not /**comment*/. Multi-line ApexDoc comments should only be used when the content genuinely requires multiple lines.
